Forms¶

class cart.forms.CartForm(data=None, files=None, auto_id='id_%s', prefix=None, initial=None, error_class=<class 'django.forms.utils.ErrorList'>, label_suffix=None, empty_permitted=False, field_order=None, use_required_attribute=None, renderer=None)¶

Create form for adding products to the cart.

Requires only quantity field.

Form fields:

  • quantity: Количество (IntegerField)

property media¶

Return all media required to render the widgets on this form.

Django-e-shop
